</br>
I am a master's student in spatial analytics with a background in environmental research. Through three journal publications in remote sensing and hydrology, I have developed a strong interest in data analysis and visualization. I aim to leverage my skill set to effectively communicate data-driven insights and inform decision-making.

I hold a bachelor's degree in Earth Science, specializing in Geosciences. Fluent in English, Chinese, and Japanese, my passion for learning languages has shaped my ability to approach problems creatively from diverse perspectives.
